00018 static const DbjComponent componentId = CommandLine;

00020 
00027 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00028 {
00029     DbjErrorCode rc = DBJ_SUCCESS;
00030     DbjError error;
00031 
00032     DBJ_TRACE_ENTRY();
00033 
00034     if (argc != 1) {
00035         printf("\nUsage: %s\n\n", argv[0]);
00036         return EXIT_FAILURE;
00037     }   
00038 
00039     {
00040         DbjSystem system;
00041         rc = system.start();
00042         if (rc != DBJ_SUCCESS) {
00043             DBJ_TRACE_ERROR();
00044             goto cleanup;
00045         }
00046     }
00047 
00048  cleanup:
00049     {
00050         char errorMessage[1000];
00051         error.getError(errorMessage, sizeof errorMessage);
00052         printf("%s\n", errorMessage);
00053     }
00054     return error.getErrorCode() == DBJ_SUCCESS ? EXIT_SUCCESS : EXIT_FAILURE;
00055 }
